About me…
============
<p>CHENG TSZ CHUNG</p>

<p>2003 <br>
born in Hong Kong <br>
watercolor painter <br></p>

As a painter focusing on watercolor, my inspiration mainly comes from nature, especially the sky. My works are influenced by both Impressionism and Chinese art, hoping to turn moments in nature into eternity through painting.<p><p>

<H2>Biography<br></H2>
<H5>Exhibition<br></H5>
2024		Lucid Monologue｜HONG KONG BAPTIST UNIVERSITY <p>
2022 		2021-2022 Freshman Exhibition｜ACADEMY OF VISUAL ARTS, HKBU <p>

<H5>Education<p></H5>
2021-2025	Bachelor of Arts (Hons) in Visual Arts｜HONG KONG BAPTIST UNIVERSITY<p>
            Year of intended graduation: June 2025
